name: Jade Dynasty (itch)
description:
Welcome to the early release of Jade Dynasty!
Note: the game is very rough around the edges right now, so with that in mind, enjoy!

Controls for reference:

WASD - Move

Mouse/MB1 - aim/shoot

Space - Dodge

Mouse Wheel - switch weapons (4 max weapons)

Our Discord

Credits:

Art Lead - Luis D Rojas
